data.name: World of Speed - BMW M3 E30
data.detailed_description:
Add an exclusive classic German BMW M3 E30 coupe to your collection. In addition to the car, the DLC includes a unique color scheme and a set of premium bonuses.

BMW M3 E30 is a classic representative of German charged road cars. Created in 1986 on the base of the conventional BMW E30, the M3 features a more powerful engine, enhanced suspension and modified body elements.

In World of Speed, the BMW M3 E30 is the collectible car of advanced level. Due to its small weight and rear-wheel drive layout, the M3 E30 is an excellent choice for an experienced driver. Combining high speed and excellent handling at high speeds, this car is able to challenge even the most modern rivals.

This collectible car is available exclusively as part of early access, it will not be possible to receive it after the full release of the game.

The DLC includes:
  • BMW M3 E30 collectible car
  • Unique color scheme
  • 10000 Credits (standard game currency)
  • 3500 Diamonds (premium game currency)
  • 30 days of Premium Account (an amount of received credits, experience and dealer reputation is increased to 150%)

data.short_description: Add an exclusive classic German BMW M3 E30 coupe to your collection. In addition to the car, the DLC includes a unique color scheme and a set of premium bonuses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 (DxDiag)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 CPU, 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 440 1GB / NVIDIA GeForce GT 620 1GB or AMD Radeon R7 240 2G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 (DxDiag)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU, 3.5GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 4GB or AMD Radeon R9 270 4GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
